sqlMap.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY QESTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNQUSTNRIEM SET IEM_SN=#iemSn#, IEM_CN=#iemCn#, ETC_ANSWER_AT=#etcAnswerAt#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE QUSTNR_IEM_ID = #qustnrIemId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID QESTNR_QESITM_ID, (SELECT QESTN_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID) QESTNR_QESITM_CN, A.QESTNR_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_SJ FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO WHERE QESTNR_ID = A.QESTNR_ID) QESTNR_CN, A.IEM_SN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID = #qustnrIemId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.IEM_SN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1
AND IEM_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%' )
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1
AND IEM_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%' )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNQUSTNRIEM ( QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, QESTNR_ID, IEM_SN, QUSTNR_IEM_ID, IEM_CN, ETC_ANSWER_AT, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #qestnrQesitmId#, #qestnrId#, #iemSn#, #qustnrIemId#, #iemCn#, #etcAnswerAt#, #qestnrTmplatId#, SYSDATETIME, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME, #lastUpdusrId# )
